item.description:
Let's keep savoring Summer with Sunday Brunch followed by a ferry trip to Spectacle Island.

We'll start with relaxing Sunday Brunch at the Living Room at 101 Atlantic Ave., Boston:

 

http://thelivingroomboston.com/

http://thelivingroomboston.com/menu/brunch/

After brunch, we'll head out to the Spectacle Island on the ferry to take in the Berkelee Jazz on Spectacle.   Spectacle Island is on of the Boston Harbor Islands, which are part of our National Park system.  The island features walking paths, a swimming beach, and a "green" visitors' center.  That's day's presentation from Berklee will be taking place from 1:00pm until 3:00pm.

http://bostonharborislands.org/spectacle

http://bostonharborislands.org/event-details?x=1&rid=1600

We can take the 1:30 Harbor Islands Ferry to Spectacle, and return on the 4:00pm ferry.

The ferry leaves from the North side of Long Wharf, adjacent to Christopher Columbus Park and the Long Wharf Marriott.

The ticket cost is $14.00, and we are all responsible for purchasing and securing our own tickets.  Tickets may be easily purchased on-line.

 

http://bostonharborislands.org/ferry-schedule-summer

http://bostonharborislands.org/tickets

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Sunday Brunch and Spectacle Island
